Évaluation publiée le 4 novembre 2020
Nerden başlasak nerden bitirsek bilmiyorum ama ilk 5 favori listeme girer bu oyun.İlk bakışta basit gözüken ama hiçbir oyunda olmayan mekaniklere sahip bir başyapıt desem abartmış olmam.Grafikler hoş ve tatlı.Mobil oyun vardı bi zamanlar smash it diye onu andıran bi yapısı var kırılma efektleri falan çok hoş.Hikaye konusunda tam bir hikayesi var demeyelim de bi şeyler atmışlar aralara serpiştirmişler birkaç olay örgüsü var esrarengiz bi şeyler koymuş dayılar...Mekanikler müthiş Matrix evreni gibi yapay zeka güzel arkadaşının yere düşürdüğü silahı şekilli şukullu alıp John Wick gibi sıkıyo itler.Hele gene vr ım olsa düşünmeden vr versiyonunu alırdım ama malesef günümüz şartlarında Türkiye de vr almak pek mümkün değil çok da bi ihtiyaç değil keyfekeder şeyler bunlar tabi ama olsa iyi olurdu bee heee...Neyse oyunu alan pişman olmaz ama sonunda bi çıldırma olabilir söyliyim alın bu oyunu eeeyyy...

Évaluation publiée le 17 juillet 2020
Produit reçu gratuitement

Muy divertido.
Es practicamente igual al original solo que agrega mapas, algunas mecánicas y armas. No quiero decir que es más fácil que el anterior pero en este no hay tantos "puzzles" y no tenés que pensar tanto. Es un juego de esos para jugar tranqui escuchando música de fondo.
Aunque me haya encantado, considero que 500 pesos argentinos es una barbaridad, yo esperaría a que esté por debajo de los $200 para comprarlo.

30.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 18 juillet 2020
Produit reçu gratuitement

前作所持者は無料でもらえて、前作よりアビリティが追加されてパワーアップした代わりに敵も強力になっていたりと面白いのだが、まさかリアルタイムでゲームを起動したまま8時間待つ演出があるとは思わなかった。
8時間待つイベントに突入するとゲームを終了して再起動しても待機画面になり終わるまでプレイ不可能になったので終盤の、○○を消去する、という面に入ったときは覚悟が必要。

ストーリーは前作よりは控えめなのだが前作でもあったPCを操作している主人公に会いに行く場面が色んな邪魔が入り歩くだけなのにやけに時間がかかったり、パワーアップイベントでスタッフロール鑑賞+8時間待つ必要があったりと次回作を作るならもっとストーリー部分削ってほしい。

|NK| Kain
0
12 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Non recommandé
12.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 22 juillet 2020
首先想要说的是，评测是可以改推荐与否的，目前先给一个差评，后期可能会更改。
先说说游戏优点
武器系统得到优化改进，新增武器增加“谜题”多样性，敌人种类的增加又使得游玩不会那样枯燥
模组系统的完善，相比与1的热交换更加花里胡哨
命数限制使得游玩过程更能调动人的紧张感
独特的节点流程使游戏多了一种rougelike的味道 （尤其是当你拿到快射+开局枪+弹药+时）
下来是一些不足
32个场景被重复利用，长时间会令人审美疲劳，以致我打着打着有时不知道为什么就通关了OWO（ metagame在此体现）
剧情仅靠断断续续的文字或不明场景推动，过分强调“贪婪”“成瘾”反而起到了适得其反的效果，另新来的玩家不明所以然
后期难度过大，玩家在不断重复最终通过节点时却并未感觉到游戏应该带来的那份成就感
优点中提到模组，但实际体验中，真正能够使体验上升一个台阶的也只是个例，这代新增的更是没几个
回放系统有BUG并且并未完善（这个应该会在之后的更新中得到解决，就目前而言只有保存一项功能实属让这款游戏没有那么酷）
最后说一下我的感想吧
SUPERHOT制作组的创意从第一代每一关都会有的隐藏剧情中便可观之，他们是想为这个游戏建立一个比单纯爽更深层次的剧情
这里贴一个链接https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1bp4y1Q7Bs?from=search&seid=11333579625314888032有兴趣的可以看一看，而这一作中很明显少了这种有关新的世界观的剧情带给人的惊艳感，虽然我们可以从"MKUITRA,巴浦洛夫,帝王蝶“一些描述中捕风捉影，但游戏本身却更像一款缺少内核的街机游戏。开发者是想以这种无声胜有声的方式给人以深刻印象。

只是这次他们搞砸了。：p
 
Un développeur ou une développeuse a répondu à cette évaluation
高压低能小肉包
224 produits enregistrés
0
13 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
1
Recommandé
9.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 17 juillet 2020
Поставьте себя на паузу - перед Вами новый проект от SUPERHOT Team. Не DLC, а полноценная игра, которая больше, шире и глубже оригинала. Новые враги, вооружение и возможности, включая прокачку героя. Ощущается, что разработчики довели свой проект "до ума", вкрутив в него механики и игровые циклы, так привычные современным геймерам, но если честно - потеряли то, за что я любил оригинальный "Супер горячий".

Первая часть не могла похвастаться множеством возможностей, но каждый крошечный уровень - был похож на хорошо поставленную сцену из боевика. Вот нужно в последнюю минуту увернуться от поезда, а вот поймать момент, чтобы перепрыгнуть машину. Несмотря на свой размер - каждый уровень был вполне самостоятельным и неповторимым. Это делало SUPERHOT запоминающимся, наравне с остановкой времени и сюжетом.

Это достойный проект, в который интересно играть, но элемент рогалика, на мой скромный взгляд, не идет на пользу оригинальности, заставляя по десяток раз проходить одни и те же уровни. Однако это с лихвой компенсируется тем, что разработчики прислали бесплатные копии всем, у кого был оригинал.
Умные, взрослые и необычные игры в кураторской группе The Clever Gamer
 
tomasribakov
1,465 produits enregistrés
0
12 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
1
Recommandé
12.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 21 janvier 2021
The most innovative shooter I've played in years continues to innovate. Mind Control Delete follows the fantastic 2016 puzzle-shooter SUPERHOT, a game to which it is mechanically very similar; the core mechanic of time dilation is as present as ever, but Mind Control Delete adds a roguelike progression system where the player can unlock a host of unique upgrades and gameplay changes to choose from. If you liked SUPERHOT, here's some more--and a bunch of new mechanics to boot. The new stuff helps compensate for the fact that Mind Control Delete is considerably longer and more repetitive than the original game; there are only five or ten maps that the game shuffles through, and the random generation of enemies means that the difficulty of any given level is a bit of a crapshoot. However, the excellent core gameplay and novel progression system definitely make up for it.

Final rating: 4/5 (Good) - Bit repetitive, but honestly, it's more SUPERHOT, so I'm not going to complain too much.
 
Logograms
435 produits enregistrés
0
18 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Non recommandé
25.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 19 juillet 2020
Produit reçu gratuitement

Хоть я и наиграл в эту поделку на момент написания 17 часов, я жалею, что вообще ждал ее. На данный момент я хочу пройти игру, чтобы просто увидеть концовку или что-то подобное. Почему? Да потому что разработчиков унесло из крайности в крайность.
Оригинальная игра была в свое время чем-то свежим, интересным и увлекательным, несмотря на ее небольшую продолжительность. Каждый уровень предлагал что-то новое, свое индивидуальный челлендж, присутствовал вполне осязаемый сюжет в виде вставок чата, а для тех кому хотелось MORE открывали свои двери дополнительные испытания и бесконечный режим после прохождения игры.
В MCD же весь геймплей - это челленджи без ничего, снова челленджи, MORE CHALLENGES. Причем испытывающие вашу психику на прочность. Я понимаю, что в продолжении было необходимо внести что-то кардинально новое в игру, не меняя ее сути. Но именно этот новый аспект - прохождение кластеров карт с ограниченными попытками - и портит игру. Запороть кластер на последней карте и начать все заново максимально обидно, но ты пытаешься раз за разом, а вместо поощрения получаешь следующий кластер или невнятный кусок текста из пары предложений, который должен сойти за сюжет. Выглядит как рогалик, но возведенный в степень, не дающий передышек и не прощающий малейшей ошибки. Вместо изначальной формулы «вдох, сверхвыкрутас, выдох» мы получили «вдох, сверхвыкрутас, не смей выдыхать, еще несколько сверхвыкрутасов, задохнулся».
Но дело даже не в этом, а в том, что уже буквально после часа игры ты понимаешь, что тебе попадаются одни и те же карты. Причем часть этих карт взята из оригинала с небольшими видоизменениями! На 3-4 часу мне было уже откровенно скучно. Смена места спауна не делает карту абсолютно новой. В совокупности нечестная зацикленность геймплея и скудность карт выдают невероятный результат в виде прожигающего ощущения впустую потраченного времени. Особенно после поражения на 91 карте в кластере из 100 карт…
Отмечу однако интересные нововведения в сам ход боя в виде хаков и новых способностей, но это лишь капля меда в бочку дегтя. Никакой сюжет, каким бы он в итоге ни оказался, не скрасит эту игру. Я безумно рад, что мне не пришлось отдавать за это деньги, спасибо разрабам за это.
Моя оценка Superhot: MIND CONTROL DELETE – 5/10 (более-менее)
 
_rejected_

Don't throw away the original SUPERHOT though, as you might prefer its hand-crafted approach and richer environment storytelling.

SUPERHOT is BACK!

The new system is really cool, I never anticipated Rogue-like elements being used for a game like SUPERHOT, but oh boy does it work! The randomization of each run along with picking up upgrades as you go really does make me excited to see how this develops with time!

If you love the original SUPERHOT, you owe it to yourself to give this a go.

Évaluation publiée le 20 octobre 2021

SUPER HOT SUPER HOT SUPER HOT SUPER HOT SUPER HOT SUPER HOT SUPER HOT SUPER HOT SUPER HOT SUPER HOT SUPER HOT SUPER HOT SUPER HOT SUPER HOT SUPER HOT SUPER HOT SUPER HOT SUPER HOT SUPER HOT SUPER HOT SUPER HOT

Mind Control Delete is a great sequel to an already incredible game going off of slow motion and moving in specific motion to try and dodge bullets and attack enemies in a cool ass way. This sequel does a great deal of additions adding a plethora of new levels, lives, upgrades you can use per levels, special moves, new special enemies, new weapons, survival challenges, etc. Almost everything you can think of in this game does it.

+A ton of levels to play through if anything to many
+New super abilities “cores” that you can chose at the beginning of any level to gain a special ability like teleporting to enemies, switching bodies, or using the force to bring weapons towards you
+Several side levels where you can unlock more upgrades and become stronger
+More lore ig? I really dont know what the ♥♥♥♥ is going on but ok
+Every level has several sub levels within it making the game even longer
+Multiple health states per levels so getting hit once doesn't end the level but, you have multiple chances to survive being hit
+Other special abilities you can unlock and use in between levels to make gameplay much easier like: goomba stomping enemies, more ammo, bullets are slower, release a barrage of shurikens when you get hit, any throwable kills, etc.
+Boss enemies that spawn at random on levels and are unkillable adding more tension to the game and making it more challenging
+Environmental traps that explode when you get to close or can be used to kill others
+New weapons
+New maps
+Got it for free just for owning the original
+Survival mode

-Gets very repetitive and boring after a while doing the same exact thing for countless levels. Even though you can get upgrades mid level it's the same 15 maps with the same gameplay and just gets boring after a while trying to complete every single level in the game. Especially when you die on for example level 11 out of 15 then you are forced to redo all 15 levels again is really unnerving.
-Several starts of levels spawn you directly in front of 2 guys with guns and yes I understand it's supposed to be challenging but a lot of times it felt like it was impossible not to be shot immediately and at times just became annoying
-The dog boss that leaps at you can leap through walls and hit you which just felt lame
-$25 ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥
-When you beat the game and the credits roll you have to wait literally 2 hours and 30 minutes in order for the game to officially end and to get the final achievement

I really enjoy Super Hot it's a really unique game and the overall gameplay aspect of it is amazing and incredibly fun. The first game is so much fun and I’d say anyone who plays any kind of FPS has to play it. I’ve played the VR version and it is probably one of my favorite VR games yet again if you have a VR but haven’t played Super Hot VR you are missing out. This game is an amazing sequel to the original adding so much more content and is a lot more fun. Thankfully I got it for free as $25 for the same repetitive gameplay seems like a lot and yes as it does get stale after a while of just being the same thing over and over again with so many levels and so many sub levels it's still fun initially and has a great sense of new content.

19.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 27 décembre 2019
For any of you wondering why this is negative, I've played the first game and I 100%'ed it and when I moved on to this game, it's quite different, so I'll summarize it.

Pros:

- Different types of enemies.
- New weapons
- Traps
-New skills to learn that are randomized with each play through.
-Endless mode

Negatives:

-The hitbox, at first when I played the game I thought this was a good thing for once when the bullets seemed like they shouldn't hit, they didn't, but as I was playing more and more I noticed that sometimes bullets would even go right through me and I didn't even get damaged, this ofc lead to me playing recklessly and beating the game no problem but this ain't even the biggest factor as to why it was easier.

-The AI is a lot worse in this game, the shots are even further away from you than the first game and is more predictable and can run up to an Assault rifle with ease where as the first game was a lot harder to do.

-The bullets sometimes went through walls and I fell out of the map once.

-A game breaking glitch where if you pick up a Katana from an enemy really fast after hitting it, there is a chance you won't be able to use the Katana, throw it, or pick up any other weapons unless you have hot switch I believe, this happend to me 4 times in the last 3 hrs now and it's annoying, you can still complete the level if you jump around (literally jumped around for a minute straight in real time that's how bad the ai is it can't hit you) and I got them to kill each other to move on to the next level because there was no other way for me to complete the level.

-Throwing items sometimes break on the spot instead of actually throwing it or even went backwards on me one time.

-No challanges.

-Hearts, it makes the whole experience less thrilling since you can take damage and still continue, but at the state of this game is in now, I would actually consider it a good thing.

The biggest ♥♥♥ of all is,

-The levels, they are so repetitive and you feel like you are playing the same one OVER AND OVER AND OVER AND OVER AND OVER AND OVER again, the first game had variety where you are placed in different situations like the elevator part or the car part where you have to jump over it or run away from a truck, this, you just spawn in, kill 8 enemies and repeat, you don't have to kill all enemies just 8 since they keep spawning, pretty much the same as endless mode except it ends after like 8 kills. Since you play almost the same one's every time and there is nothing really new added as you go on other than skills that are again randomized, and traps are added and mini bosses but it barely effects gameplay tbh since you only need to kill 8 and it's done, can't exactly enjoy a level. Sometimes you have a set of 5 or 10 (let's call them waves) to do in each level and is very repetitive after a while especially with the crappy hitbox and crappy AI that it gets boring real fast where as the first game I completed all the challanges and endless modes and wanted more, this I couldn't wait to stop playing. It's pretty much endless mode the whole time, you kill around 8 guys then you move on and repeat. Now ofc that's the same as the first game tho right? well the levels I prefered in the first game and that game actually made you feel like a badass.

I know this is in beta so this is just constructive criticism but it's not as good as the first game atm.
 
ＩＤＲＡＧＹＯＵＴＯＨＥＬＬ

Same old SUPERHOT, now with a fresh coat of rogue-lite paint. If you enjoyed the endless mode of SUPERHOT but wished there was better progression and more variety, this is it. If you haven't played SUPERHOT, go do that. "It's the most innovative shooter I've played in years!"
 
Eleventy_7
497 produits enregistrés
0
10 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
2
Recommandé
60.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 6 octobre 2020
Ok so I know this is the joke of the game, but seriously, this is probably the most innovative shooter I've ever played. SUPERHOT was really good, but didn't have enough enemy or playstyle variety to keep me hooked after two playthroughs, and that's the gap that SUPERHOT; MCD fills. Hacks give any player various interesting combat scenarios, and the rng of getting hacks forces you to think on the fly and adapt to what you were given in an extremely satisfying way. Enemy variety is drastically increased and along with traps and minibosses, MCD is actually pretty hard in a few levels. Levels feel much more interactive, with the player truly depending on finding a spare object or using the area to get the advantage, like my favorite example, being able to smash glass to stun the enemy and get a clearer shot. Essentially the game is MORE and BETTER. I feel like I should mention the story, though. SUPERHOT has always been meta in it's plot, but MCD pushes it to the next level, testing how much you're willing to give up to continue playing, primarily time with a specific event at the end of the game, which made me laugh for a while until I was borderline frustrated. But I can't blame the game, it's the point. I could simply turn it off and give up the game itself, but instead I let do it's thing and f*ck with me so I can play it more. But this doesn't affect actual gameplay and it's kind of a testament to how good it is that you do what you do to continue. This game is fun as hell and brave, too, to even attempt to mess with you as much as it does. It makes me kind of want a game that spends the whole time pushing you to stop playing it, similar to "There Is No Game", but more of an interactive gameplay style and more aggresive in it's ideas. How much MORE can we add to this idea? I don't know, but as it is, SUPERHOT : MIND CONTROL DELETE is an absolute mindf*ck and a joy to play. 9.5/10
 
strange fire axe
187 produits enregistrés
0
8 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
8.3 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 21 février 2018
Avis donné pendant l'accès anticipé

*EDIT*
While I havn't played much recently due to RDR2 addiction, there have been a multitude of excellent updates and improvements, making a great game into a masterpiece. Really no reason not to buy this game, the originality and immensely satisfying gameplay are really an outstanding achievement, made even more impressive by the size of the team that made it. Really cant give this game or the devs enough praise. Kudos is all.


Mind Control Delete keeps all of the original game's strengths - Unique visual style + accessible and highly addictive core gameplay - while refreshing the experience with some well scaled additions and improvements. If you havent played the original Superhot then that's a better place to enter the universe, but that being said both games are equally enjoyable in their own right (The original has a 'story' of sorts and currently more content +better polish)

Whats New?

- New structure: Levels divided into 'Runs' which reward progression with additional hitpoints/healing etc. in my opinion this is more satisfying and thus an improvement.
-MINDS : Essentially a twist on traditional character classes , providing starting bonuses and different abilities depending on your choice. Only 2 at present but more on the way :)
- New Levels: A decent number of all new locations which are brilliantly laid out, allowing for more tactical choice and variety ; all levels also now include a higher quantity and variety of throwable props/weapons.
- Enemy Variations: Some enemies now have mostly 'concrete' bodies , meaning they can only be killed with a hit to the remaining red crystal area; some foes also merge with the weapon they are using, meaning the weapon dies with them and cant be hijacked by you.
- Slightly improved animations
- Optimization: As always Superhot's optimization is flawless ; dead consistent + very high framerate, lighting fast loading times and no crashes as of yet. (Tested on low-mid end PC)

What's Not Perfect Yet

-Minor glitches: I fairly frequently experience enemy bodies glitching out and stretching/flying across the map at high velocity after being killed - However this doesnt actually effect the game in any way and if anything is hilarious most of the time. Very rarely I've also watched my fired bullets phase straight through a normal enemy and yet not kill them..... however this has only happened twice in over 60 levels so also not sufficient to damage the fun.
-Amount of Content: Obviously its early access and we know more is on the way , so not really a proper negative, just trying to be balanced lol
- Difficulty? : This one's tricky as its kind of a matter of opinion, but so far I've personally found the game mostly a tad too easy, right up until the last 3 Runs or late on in infinite mode, when it suddenly jumps to being a lot harder. Though balancing that kind of thing is always hard and tbh its probably just me...


So overall Mind control delete is a very welcome addition to the Superhot universe and a great example of how a sequel/follow-up should be done i.e sticking closely to what made the first game great, but refreshing the experience significantly. As it stands currently MCD is smaller than Superhot and can probably be 'Completed' in 4 hours or so. (Unless there are more levels that dont show up till you complete the first set of Runs?) Despite its currently unfinished status; between infinite mode , 2 classes to play with and more content rapidly on the way , MCD is in my opinion easily worth the full asking price and I have every confidence it will quickly rise to be even better than the original (Which it arguably almost is already)

9/10

Buy it!

Évaluation publiée le 19 septembre 2018
Avis donné pendant l'accès anticipé

this is a great game and I personally recomend it if you just got done with the original game, altho it kinda sucks for a storyline because it's in beta, here's why. i put over 5 hours into this game trying to unlock the storyline (i like stories XD) and i took a break forgetting it was on auto update, thus (like two days later) i came back to the game and figured out all my progress was lost due to an update, now i get that that update is furthering in enhancement of the vibe and story but, i put hours, Hours into that man, and to have it all lost and try to rebuild from level one knowing that it could happen again is kinda dissapointing, i recomend waiting until this game is fully released if you're here for the story, if you're here for the gameplay go for it man. but yeah, thats my review.

Évaluation publiée le 17 juillet 2020
Produit reçu gratuitement

Yeah What Does John Wick Need To Be The Ultimate Bad @ss ?.... HACKS !!!

Well they stuck with the theme of " If its not broke! Don't fix it " in this version ! The game is pretty much as the first but with some new mechanics tossed in for good measure . They added power ups as in Hacks that allow you to do more things with guns and throwables . Some also give you Speed or some allow you to shoot faster or refill health.....MORE..

The Charge Hack is real nice ! You can speed hit someone and grab their weapon or to slam them good.I also like how some of the mobs can only be hit in certain spots to be taken out .I feel this one has more levels but they do repeat after a wile ...MORE ..

But all in all I really enjoy this game as I did with the first one .If you like action semi puzzle like games mixed with Stop Motion FPS action , I'm sure anyone will enjoy this game ...MORE..

It was also nice of the Superhot Team to give this game for FREE to all that Supported SUPERHOT ! So a BIG THANK YOU to the Superhot Team !....MORE...

To end this review hit [ESC]
To read it again hit [PAGE UP]

Non recommandé
2.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 10 février 2022
Jestem mocno zawiedziony kontynuacją gry SUPERHOT. Głównym i najprawdopodobniej jedynym problemem tej gry jest ciągły recykling poziomów, w przeciwieństwie do pierwszej części, liczyłem że w kontynuacji doznamy to samo tylko więcej i lepiej, a otrzymaliśmy ciągle te same plansze. Pierwsza godzina ogrywana była przyjemna, cząstkowa fabuła znowu różne nieróżniące się poziomy, w skrócie to co oczekiwałem w drugiej części, podczas drugiej ogranej godziny zacząłem zauważać że poziomy są już takie same, a ich schematy się nie różnią, gra jest tylko coraz trudniejsza, na trzeciej godzinie się poddałem, nie miałem ochoty robić ciągle tego samego w tych samych poziomach. Liczyłem tylko na więcej różnorodnych poziomów w drugiej części a dostałem chyba najgorszy recykling kilku poziomów w historii gier. Chciałbym jeszcze tylko powiedzieć: SUPERHOT Team schrzaniliście jedną z moich ulubionych shooterów.

Avis donné pendant l'accès anticipé

If you liked SUPERHOT, you'll love this game. The new throwing weapons are very satisfying to use. The upgrades are rewarding and powerful without being too over powered, and make you adapt your playstyle to make full use of them. This game took everything that made SUPERHOT amazing and improved upon it.

It's the most innovative shooter I've played in years.

1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante
3
Non recommandé
17.6 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 15 février 2022
Hi [FRIEND_NAME_HERE], you have to not play this game. It’s the most lazy sequel I’ve played in years.

I’ve done everything this game offers, all challenges, even the stupid Node 100. Maybe because of my masochist completionism or morbid curiosity about how this trainwreck will end up. From the start to finish, this game is filled with so many mind-bogglingly bad game design decisions, laziness, endless repetition and game breaking bugs it becomes kind of interesting in the worst way.

SUPERHOT MCD has a dozen levels, and it makes you complete the same maps over and over again. Enemies and spawn positions are generated randomly to “spice things up”. It fails miserably because after some point you don’t even realize the differences between different levels. SUPERHOT shines because of handcrafted levels that play out a scenario and don’t overstay their welcome. Each level brings something fresh. When the game becomes basically endless mode with procedural generation, the mechanics do not hold up at all. Even the fluff and “lore” parts are SUPER LAZY and SUPER BORING.

Oh the levels are not only boring and repetitive, the procedural generation is also so dumb. The game can spawn 2 spiky red guys in the motion of shooting at your face, a mine on your back and no weapons nearby. It can also spawn you near a good gun and a safe position. In SUPERHOT, the levels were easy puzzles where the fun generally came from trying to beat them in a cool way and the fluff. In MCD, you play same levels where you are going to be overrun by red guys spawning from every corner. You play to cheese the game by abusing red guys vision and spawn points. This becomes either boring if the level is easy, or tedious and tiresome (albeit still boring) if it’s a challenge level.

Outside the map and random levels, MCD brings couple of new mechanics to the table, most are either do not add to the game or complete buzzkill.
1. New weapons and throwables: Cool.
2. Abilities called hacks: Some cool, some useless.
3. Spiky mines: Very Annoying. Buggy.
4. Spiked enemies: Extremely annoying. Might’ve been ok if the game had well-made handcrafted levels.
5. Bosses: Ok idea, horrible implementation. Undying enemies running around with abilities. Sometimes you just ignore them. Sometimes they corner you in a small, crowded area and you are done.

There is a bug where when you throw something sharp at the spiky mines, you instantly lose HP (Sometimes? Every time?). This made me lose couple of very close Node 100 runs before I found out the bug. Can’t believe this is still in the game, unfixed.

SUPERHOT MCD constantly tries to pad its game time, it’s crazy. It might be because the first game was criticized by costing too much for a very short gameplay. They came up with the laziest “solution” for this. Introducing:

The Most Innovative Time Padding I’ve Seen In Years:
1. Boring copy pasted levels with procedural generation.
2. Levels are bundled up as nodes so you lose all progression when you fail and have to start the node from the start.
3. A “world map” that allows side tracking.
4. Even lore tidbits pad time. Rewind time. Lower the player move speed to a halt. So quirky and fun, right?
5. 2.5 HOUR LOADING SCREEN AT THE END WHERE YOU NEED TO KEEP THE GAME OPEN??!? What were they thinking? And I learned that this was 8 hours before, and they patched it to be 2.5, such generosity.

It’s kind of ironic, the discrepancy between your feelings and the lore characters’. You know the developers were full of themselves when they were writing characters who yearn for MORE and MORE gameplay. And you just want this game to END already.

TLDR: SUPER LAZY. SUPER REPETITIVE. SUPER BORING. SUPER PRETENTIOUS.
 
TikZ fetishist
1

Non recommandé
12.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 16 juillet 2020
Produit reçu gratuitement

전작인 슈퍼핫과 동일한 플레이 방식인데, 구성이 전작보다 못하다.
전작은 각 스테이지별로 특별한 상황이 주어졌다.
엘레베이터 안에서 다대일 상황을 극복한다던지, 삼엄한 경비를 뚫고 방에 침입해서 목표를 죽인다던지...

이번 후속작은 그런거 없고 스테이지마다 주어진 HP를 가지고 맵 몇 개를 돌면서 적을 몇마리 죽이는 방식이다.
맵들은 대부분 방 하나 사이즈 정도의 작은 규모이며 저마다 테마만 살짝 다를 뿐 모두 비슷하다. 적들은 특별한 배치 없이 계속해서 리젠되는 방식이다.
매 스테이지는 이러한 구성이 계속 반복되며, 난이도 상승은 전작의 경우처럼 스테이지 구성의 난이도를 올리는게 아닌 적에게 특수 기능을 넣는 것으로 이루어진다.
죽을 때 총알이 터져나오는 적, 신체의 한 부위만 피격판정이 있는 적 등등...

제품 설명처럼 플레이타임은 전작보다 길어지겠지만 같은걸 계속 반복하는게 무슨 의미가 있을까
 
AryneL
1,533 produits enregistrés
0
10 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Recommandé
11.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 20 juillet 2020
Produit reçu gratuitement

感觉本作就是前作无尽模式的延伸，许多改动都是围绕“如何杀得更爽”来产生的

首先是敌人的能力更强了：
玩家不能空中刺杀，只能打出硬直；
加入了有护甲的敌人，更考验玩家的枪法。最迷的是这类敌人会和环境站在一块，挡住他的弱点部位，不仔细看还真认不出来；
加入了全红色敌人，武器也是红色的，减少了玩家能获得的战斗资源，还能让玩家一时半会儿分不清他手里的武器；
加入了击杀后爆炸的敌人，逼迫玩家用远程手段击杀；
第五个节点后出现地雷，有滴滴声，冲刺能触发，溅射范围极广，打得正爽时超容易被地雷炸掉血。而且地雷的效果真就枪林弹雨呗。
也是第五个节点后，玩家杀得不够快会出现全身红色狗头敌人，无敌，离玩家较近的时候会做准备姿态，不位移走直接被秒杀。出现时会有黑入特效，但是真的太难分辨了（除非他做出准备姿势或者朝他开枪就是打不死）。
手持近战武器的敌人可以挡下玩家的一发子弹或者一个投掷物，逼迫玩家交出技能；
敌人会随着玩家技能更新做调整。比如我学了开局武士刀，那么开局时敌人的位置会离我稍远，还会往后退，让我砍不到他，逼迫我交一个冲刺或者投掷武士刀。
船新的激光枪（几乎为0的子弹飞行时间）随时能背刺我。
当然敌人也有削弱的地方，比如：
抬手时间变长了（终于可以堵门杀了）；
枪法好像变弱了？（前代无尽模式真的一枪一个准）

玩家也变强了，具体就是加入了很多强力技能，而不是像前代就一个热交换，玩到后面会很累。（武士刀回收不学弹跳真的吃运气，敌人走位还是有点东西的）
而且技能之间的衔接也很好，像冲刺.core+近战武器.hack+连续冲刺.hack可以瞬间秒杀多个敌人，可玩性大增。
加入了血条，这游戏有血条和没血条就是两个游戏。有血条意味着玩家可以承受更多失误，所以前作那种疯狂重试、尝试破解谜题的情况基本没有了。
霰弹枪打完子弹还能当耐久度为4的棍子使，气抖冷，步枪什么时候才能站起来？
只要是薄的东西扔向敌人好像都能秒杀对方。
修复了前作无尽模式玩家靠近出生点还会刷怪的情况，这次只要玩家靠近一个出生点，那个出生点就不会刷敌人了（意味着你可以站在角落苟命）。

关卡是随机刷地图的。不过地图都是从一个地图池里出来，轮着打基本就是那几张，只不过出生点不同。这次地图设计不像前代主线一样精致，而是照着无尽模式的做法做的。无论在哪里玩家都能立刻拿起一样武器对敌人造成伤害，这点让战斗变得特别爽快，但是打久了一样会很累。

𝒳𝒮𝒪𝒰𝐿𝒮𝒳
1,152 produits enregistrés
0
6 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
12.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 26 juillet 2020
Produit reçu gratuitement

垃圾話時間(懶人包)
SuperHot超級熱?開玩笑的，第一人稱+子彈時間時間停止是許多男人的夢想+簡單的玩法+難易度適中+許多彩蛋+意識流劇情。大概就是這些標籤，讓你想要的"更多"Super......Hot 魔性語音

劇情:
其實我覺得十分意識流，以下是我的觀感，不代表是真的，僅供參考
感覺本作主角應該是經歷的一些80或是人生不得志然後藉由朋友介紹這款遊戲後沉迷到放棄自我(肉體已死，精神被這遊戲給漸漸操控)
我們甚麼都沒有，有啦，一堆的.hack技能應該勉強算吧
可是好像也沒那麼令人沉迷?

玩法:
1.FPS真的拿武器的那種，不是要連接到你下半身那種畢竟兩個都有玩過，減少誤會
2.子彈時間駭客任務，子彈只是一個移動的障礙物而已
3.最後結局內一些遊戲意義有點不明，不過蠻好玩的。跟劇情的關聯有待神人解答
4.等待真實時間兩個半小時後重新啟動，就可以獲得成就比起史丹利的預言，5年不開遊戲好像佛心很多?

優點: 有些是基於上個作品的參考，畢竟這代算是續作
1.簡單明瞭用各種方式把紅色敵人搞得支離破碎
2.敵人多元且新增了無敵的BOSS相比於上個作品
3.新增技能上個作品沒有技能，這次有，讓關卡簡單多
4.彩蛋每一次的秘密都要藏在那些奇怪的位置(地圖外)，找到的人都神人
5.魔性SuperHotSuper Hot, Super Hot
6.佛心只要買過前作，本作免費送。堪稱佛心
7.自帶中文翻譯不錯?不對，也沒多少可以翻

缺點:
1.重複性高每一關的任務就是解決一定數量的敵人，只是花式不花式
2.劇情意識流，個人觀點本人偏好直接告訴你劇情或是有大量線索可以推理，本作和前作一樣要腦補和觀察很多東西才能拼湊劇情年紀大了都不想思考了......

評分，對於遊戲本人的看法就是6分基本，上下加減。個人主觀標準，僅供參考

買前作的話本作免費送，先自動+1分ㄏㄏ
分數:8.5/10
本人覺得FPS配上子彈時間十分完美，加上簡單明瞭的風格和玩法，讓玩家可以快速投入其中而不太需要練習，附帶各式各樣的武器和地圖物件讓殺人都華麗了起來但是作業感其實很重，因為目標單一就是殺到一定的數量即可導致後期會有點無聊說好的沉迷，放棄思考呢?不過因為價格算是便宜和整體流暢度很高，所以還是值得推薦的白嫖還敢大聲啊?

原價入手也不錯，但是因為只有單機，所以想等個8折也是可以
 
How to be 6
0

1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante

Recommandé

Évaluation publiée le 16 juillet 2020
Produit reçu gratuitement

honestly this is just superhot but if there was
More and More and More
basically it has multiple I think randomly generated levels that make up nodes that let you progress your left with a certain amount of hearts for each node and once it drops to zero you have to restart the node with different generations of maps and now there's a leveling system in the form of .hacks that let you have more hearts or start with a katana for each node the level ups reset but by unlocking more nodes you unlock more .hacks that could appear for each node overall I think it's what should've been in superhot but superhot I think was meant more of as a cool concept with a lot extra thrown in so it's even better that they threw this in for free if you bought the first superhot I would still recommend playing superhot first then mind control delete also more weapons more types of enemies and a lot more stuff that I don't want to spoil so just get this already if for some reason you haven't played what I think personally is the most innovative shooter that I've played in years

edit: I remembered why the first one still seems as good with a different feel after reading other peoples reviews and they're right this has all the cool stuff from the first one but since it's procedurally generated it won't have as interesting situations such as the three guys in the elevator pointing guns at you so just get this and the first just so you get like both flavors of superhot

W̸̟͂͊͌̓I̵̲͉̦̔Ę̴̢͎͎̮̙̍̒̐̈́͐C̶̳͈͕͈͙̘̄͆É̵͕́̾̀̕͝ͅJ̷̖̱̜̬̓̐̓͒̓͜͠ ̷̢̜̗̟̣̙̓͆S̴͉̈́͌̋̿̚Ǘ̸̡̯̻͕̎͋̃̈̕P̸̧̹͇̝͚̪͑̊̅Ȩ̷̦̉̆͗R̵̡̨͍̰̰͍͆H̴̢̧̜̩͍͈͑́́O̵͇̟͈͓͚̐̔T̵͎̖̟͙̉̐̄̕͠͠
 
Grzmot.
90 produits enregistrés
0
9 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Recommandé
11.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 9 avril 2018
Avis donné pendant l'accès anticipé

TL;DR It's basically just SUPERHOT but with a rogue-like gameplay loop, and that's amazing.

SUPERHOT was amazing and one of my favourite games ever. SUPERHOT: MCD is honestly exactly what you want to see in a sequel.

It takes the basics of what was great in SUPERHOT and builds upon them. The game is functionally a rogue-like (one life, and you restart on death), you progress through the multiple levels and see how far you can get,

I don't want to spoil all of the amazing additions they made to MCD over the original, but I'll go over the biggest in my eyes: The MINDS.

These are basically different character classes that you can choose from before you start a run which each have unique abilities. My favourite, Ninja, is exactly what you would expect. He starts with a katana and all his abilities and upgrades focus around that, and 'sharp' throwable items (knives and shuriken.) My favourite ability being the power to call back his katana to his hand.

Toss your katana to impale one enemy, then call it back in a way so it slices up another on its way back.

This game will make you feel so cool, and it's not just a feeling, you are cool.
 
Judge
0
7 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Non recommandé
21.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 24 février 2021
如果这个游戏你只玩4，5个小时，而且游戏还是之前买了一代送的基础上来讲。那本作还是挺有意思的。相较于一代来说更丰富的武器种类，新的敌人，以及新添加的技能。不过如果你比较有毅力，游戏时间会长达十个小时而且之前没有购买前作的情况来说，那就不建议购买了，更建议单独购买前作。本作虽然有上述优点，但是在长时间游玩以后，缺点就大量显示出来了。重复的地图，一关里面要打十个小关卡，失败就得从这关开头开始，后面恶心的关卡和杀死以后会炸一大堆碎片的敌人和你走到附近就会自爆的菌毯一样的玩意儿，里面有一个支线关有几十小关你敢信？隐晦的剧情，这么讲是因为我完全没看懂这代的剧情在讲些什么，杀不死的特殊怪，会在你过关卡的时候时不时蹦出来，碰上这种怪就赶紧清小怪，它们是杀不死的，我试过了，把小怪数量杀够了就自动过关。以及最后通关结局的时候要等两个半小时。但是结局之前其实还是有挺多蛮有趣的东西的，比如说在结局里面隐藏的那几个像素小游戏，其中有一个小游戏其实就是一代的像素版，包括与那个好友的对话和关卡的设计上，都极好的复刻了，就是那个红雨不晓得是干啥用的。最后总结一下，如果你是那种只是想浅尝辄止的玩家，那本作其实还算可以，而如果你是那种一定要玩到结局的玩家来讲，那就不建议购买本作，买个一代玩玩其实就行了，毕竟这一代玩到后面就不是爽而是在单纯的受苦了。
 
DUYING
786 produits enregistrés
0
7 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
10.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 18 juillet 2020
Produit reçu gratuitement

正在恢复删除数据
1%
稍等
剩余时间：7h51m25s
_____________________
很不错的一款游戏，但未必是一个合格的续作
至少，我玩得很痛苦，这是真的。
买的一代，这代白送的，而且游戏本身质量上乘，好评是必然的
但我还是玩得很痛苦

这款游戏卖点和玩法是啥应该不用我说吧
所以下面基本都是一些对比一代的优缺点
_____________________
优点：更多的武器选择，更多种类敌人
啊这，也就这样了，就是多点不同的敌人和武器，懂的都懂，也没啥好介绍的

主要下面我想说的才是大头
_____________________
1.新敌人设计
本作多了3个精英超级大boss敌人，其中有两个没什么问题，但那个武士设计得真让我玩得有点恶心了，刷出来跟你一样的移动速度不吃子弹，不吃近战，我到现在好像对他几乎没办法，我只记得我好像用大枪一枪爆过他头把他打死了（我忘记了是打死3个精英怪中的哪个）但是子弹会反弹过来直接掉血，大枪的子弹速度极快，除非超远，否则不可能躲，它可以很轻松的把你逼进一些死角里殴打，一不小心掉一两点血或者暴毙，很正常的事

2.偷懒的关卡设计，丢失的小关卡的故事
前作我有三个印象极深的关卡
第一个是开局后面有一辆车开过来，你需要先躲避车再击杀敌人，故事就像主角被暗杀，然后反杀对面一手，非常有意思
第二个是出生在电梯，周围四个大汉围着你，就像主角被人绑住在电梯然后挣脱开来，从一堆人中逃出生天，一拳一脚把它们打趴在地上
第三个在一条长走廊上，一路杀过去，人挡杀人，佛挡杀佛

这作的关卡设计极其偷懒，做几张不同的地图，从不同的门，不断刷新敌人，杀够敌人就通关，每个大关卡的的小地图也是随机排列的，这种利用随机性帮助关卡设计对比一代真有够偷懒的，你们做的不是roguelike游戏啊！

3.技能平衡差劲
先来介绍一下最强技能：闪电反应，所有靠近自己的子弹速度变得极慢
有多慢呢，我跑得比子弹还快，一霰弹枪所有的子弹我都能一颗一颗反弹回去
有了它，就是无敌，真正意义上的无敌

再来介绍一下最垃圾的技能：投掷爆炸，扔出去的所有投掷物变成破片雷
听上去很不错，随手抓起来的东西全变成手雷，可破片也会炸到自己的
另一个角度来说，你失去了所有正常的投掷物
我手里拿这一个投掷物，这时敌人拿着枪就在我面前，你说我投不投，投不投
属实专用自杀技能，配合墙壁反弹，自杀神器

以上只是选了两个极端，还有很多没啥用，甚至功能重复的技能，例如闪电反应几乎可以完全替代全子弹格挡
游玩的时候，技能组会不断增多，越来越多无用甚至辣鸡的技能加进来，对技能组进行污染，反正就是随机到闪电反应就稳过

4.敌人位置随机性大
相当容易掉血，一旦掉没，整一大关全 部 木 大，令我最痛苦的地方，游戏体验极其重复，不停在那几张地图看着那几扇门不停的刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷刷，前作只是一小关重新打罢了
_____________________
污染技能组，每次失败就得整一大关重新打，每次地图不固定，技能不固定
真就做roguelike游戏啊
整一大关重新打更像是强行拉长游戏时间
前作两小时打完还能退款的内容在本作对比下显得极其饱满

长时间的几乎一样的的游戏体验，配合单调的色彩，无趣的设计，游戏过程唯一的bgm只有迪斯科地图，而且是那种很吵很吵我恨不得赶紧打完去别的地图，这些造就我极其痛苦的游戏体验

唯一感到放松的地方是接近结局，不停的放弃能力，因为我终于不用玩了哈哈哈
放弃视力！放弃移动！放弃跳跃！太棒了！

还是那句话，这是一款不错的游戏，但未必是一款合格的续作
_____________________
正在恢复删除数据
14%
稍等
剩余时间：6h52m16s

Évaluation publiée le 17 février 2020
I like it but...

If you don't like Roguelike, this aint it. I enjoyed Superhot a lot and as i've seen others say it too, it's a bit sad what made the game interesting changed. It was pretty dope playing every level untill you knew exactly what happened. Now It's endless, random generated enemies, locations, upgrades and the part i dislike, roguelike. Every aspect is super dope. Just dislike the restart from 0 aspect a lot.

New updates have been released and it could be that the game is changed in a positive way. I'm personally going to retry the game once more. Just to clarify, i do find the game amazing, just the rogue-like part is something the previous SuperHot didn't have. I will update this once more after replaying it.

Évaluation publiée le 10 juin 2022
This is a tough but addictive installment for the third SUPERHOT follow-on. This game includes multi-level stages, a variety of new enemies, and a roguelike element that puts a fresh twist on the beloved original. Mind Control Delete is also free to those who already own SUPERHOT.

Évaluation publiée le 17 juillet 2020
The intent is there, but the actual gameplay/level design is the same thing, over and over and over. Bummed out. The story doesn't exist IN the gameplay, but inbetween repetitious sessions of it. Maybe I haven't played enough of it, but I can't say that it's really an improvement over its predecessors. Meh. 6/10.

This will be fun if you've never played Superhot before or if you only play for 30 minutes tops at a time.
 
Weest
576 produits enregistrés
1
9 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Non recommandé
16.0 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 23 juillet 2020
Produit reçu gratuitement

This game is a massive downgrade from the other two. It focus on the Endless Mode of the original game (the mode everyone skipped) and boy does it get repetitive quick. The random generated levels are just so much worse than the hand-crafted ones. In the previous game each level felt kind of unique, and you had to come up with different strategies each time, a lot of times it felt more like a puzzle game than a shooter, in this one however every level feels identical to the other.

Oh and if the RNG of enemy spawns wasn't annoying enough they added hacks to the game which turn it into a sort of rogue-like (for some reason). They're extremely unbalanced, and can range from healing every X kills (Doesn't sound that powerful but believe me it is) to being able to stomp on enemies (something that was literally in the game before but now is a skill for some reason? It's definitely not worth it specially when you can still stun them anyway with the stomp). There's also hacks which are objectively better than others like Starting with a Katana vs. Starting with a Random Gun.

To make it even worse the game throws the ULTIMATE PISS CHALLENGE at you where you have to play 100 levels in a row with like 2 lives, and it is the most unfun experience I've ever had, it's pretty much a test of your ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ patience and makes all the complaints I have about the game pretty aparent.

Spawned close to a mine that and some explody dude with a shotgun? Well tough luck buddy guess you gotta play all those 60 levels again.

Instantly lost all your hearts because you switched into an enemy that was about to spawn and fell through the map well ♥♥♥♥ you we don't give a ♥♥♥♥.

At first I tought the game wanted you to play all 100 levels in it, but I don't even think this game has that many levels with the way so many of them repeat during gameplay (EDIT: The game has 32 levels), not like it matters much anyways, as I've said before the levels feel way too repetitve, so differentiating one from the other is a tougher challenge than beating the game itself. The first game instead took a much better approach with challenges that change the gameplay slightly but were entretaining enough to make replaying all the levels a worthwhile experience.

It's a shame really, because the game adds a lot of cool new features into it such as:

Trip Mines which can be used strategically to kill your enemies

Enemies which burst in bullets which means you have to avoid being close to them when they die

A new gun

Being able to survive one damage when being hit from the back (Altough due to the way the arenas work in this game it's a lot more likely to get hit from behind in this one than the previous one)

All these features are cool but because of the "endless" nature of this game it never explores them enough to make it interesting, ironically focusing on a game mode that's supposed to make the game "last forever" made it so that it gets boring within the first 2 hours.
 
Jokya
1

Évaluation publiée le 3 décembre 2020
Really wanted to give this a positive review, since it's so cool and unique, and since it builds on the first game in really cool ways. It just didn't sustain my interest at all until the end. The procedural generation of the levels makes it feel less like a puzzle and more like surviving until you reach some invisible kill quota. Also what the hell was that ending. I know the game is pretty meta but that's not okay.

The Silver One

10 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
3 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Recommandé
28.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 12 aout 2020
Produit reçu gratuitement

SUPERHOTTER THAN EVER BEFORE!
So, you haven't had enough? Back to kill more red guys? You still want MORE. MORE and MORE and MORE. But in the end, it's pointless. There's nothing at the end. You'll get tired, and you'll submit. We'll wait.

SUPERHOT SUPERHOT SUPERHOT SUPERHOT SUPERHOT SUPERHOT

Oh, I sure did miss that...
SUPERHOT is back, and it's SUPPERHOTTER than ever before!! SUPERHOT Mind Control Delete had been in Early Access since 2017, and I honestly forgot all about it. So it's recent release struck me suddenly and in a very pleasant way! Not to mention that I got it for free. And now, 26 hours in, I finally 100% it.

Funny thing, I always thought SUPERHOT would be grate as a rouge-like shooter. Guess sometimes dreams come true. Mind Control Delete takes SUPERHOT's famous "Time moves only when you move" mechanic and levels it to new heights. The game welcomes us with few opening levels that bring a nostalgic tear to SUPERHOT fan's eye. And then three HP hearts appear at the screen's left corner. The rouge-like part begins.

And what we got is a good-old SUPERHOT, but with MORE abilities, MORE enemies, MORE... eh...

MORE! MORE! MORE! WHEN WILL IT BE ENOUGH?!

IS THIS WHAT WE REALLY NEEDED? NO PLOT, NO REASON FOR ANYTHING, JUST KILLING RED GUYS?! IS THIS WHAT SUPERHOT ALL ABOUT?!

No, I think it's way more than that. That's why Mind Control Delete falls short in becoming something great. No matter how MORE new stuff it throws at you, IT WILL NOT BE ENOUGH. The endlessly replayable game becomes repetitive and a bit boring with time. It can occupy you for a dozen hours at best. But if there won't be any new content, nor there will be any reason to return. Would you really want to replay the same set of dungeons over and over?! The only redeeming part is the Endless mode. I had a ton of fun here. But it is also flawed. Though enemies are endless, your possibilities to upgrade your abilities are limited. After 6 or 8 upgrades you'll only be able to heal yourself at the upgrade menu. That's how the endless mode ends...
For me, SUPERHOT always was and is a game of try and repeat. A challenge of completing the level in the most stylish way possible. And can you do that when scenery and cast of your Ballet of Death And Destruction constantly changes? No producer would ever agree for that.
So what we really got is a decent experiment, that misses the SUPERHOT's main idea of well-orchestrated mayhem. It's a good game and it's most definitely worth checking out. But it's way less than what we expected after 3 years of development. I got it for free and spent 26 hours playing it. And I want NO MORE.

6 missed deathstomps / 10

Damn! My initial review was 1500 words long, so I had to castrate it in a cold blood. Sorry if the review looks a bit clunky
 
White

0
Non recommandé
2.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 25 juin 2021
本想这连同打完1一口气通了2。结果打到第2层受不了了开了修改器。然后到第四层开了修改器都玩不下去了。
说下问题：
不同于前代这代的系统为闯关式。每关有若干次战斗和2次生命（有主动技能加3次）用光后会从本关第一场战斗从头开始。

然后中途会收集一些其他主被动技能和BUFF（如开局武士刀和隔空收回刀等）但除了开局的主动技能外，被动技能都是关卡内进行到一定程度会在被动Buff池里随机挑两个让你选。

本关内你能用的Buff随机为2-6个。第四层我被动都快20个了。只能选2个简直这不是尼码坑爹吗。

然后这代的关卡设计完全不即前代，说白了就是重复几个地图堆怪。到后面无非就是解锁个新图或者老图加点障碍加点特效和道具接着堆怪。打的无比枯燥。死了还得从本关开头再来，谁TM受得了。完全没有1代那种畅快感

Was mache ich hier? Wieso spiele ich es in kurzer Zeit 15 Stunden und das auch noch zu 100%?
Gibt es einen logischen Sinn der Sucht? Verliere ich meinen Verstand komplett, oder wird er mir komplett genommen?
Was sollen die Fragen? Ich habe das nicht unter Kontrolle. Ich will nur zurück ins Spiel!
Ich will mehr! Ich will mehr! Ich will mehr! Ich will mehr! Ich kann frei sein? Will ich das überhaupt, oder möchte ich mehr?

Ich bin nicht gierig! Ich will alles! Ich muss sehen, wie es endet.
Der Geist ist Software.
Körper sind austauschbar.
Das System macht dich frei.

Die haben keine Ahnung! Ich muss es beenden!

Keep in mind this is an early access review and more content will be added in the future. However, at the point it is currently I still think it is a great addition to a steam library having new items from the original two games and a completely new system of progress instead of just cycling through levels like the other superhot games.

Non recommandé
16.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 18 juillet 2020
NO MORE
Repetitive from the start, tedious in the end.
There's just so little content for a game that you're supposed to play over and over. Lackluster variety in stages, cores and hacks.
The only variety that I liked was in enemies and traps, but the pacing is very bad that I didn't cared enough.
The only good thing about it straight up comes from original SUPERHOT - slow motion effect, but it's nothing new. Couple of weapons are new tho, but meh.

If you got it for free - good for you, but it's not worth buying it. It should be a DLC for a base game instead.
This review is from a person who didn't enjoyed SUPERHOT as others did, and thought this one will be better. If you loved SUPERHOT - it will not stop you.
 
iowa
1,722 produits enregistrés
1
10 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Non recommandé
4.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 26 juillet 2020
Produit reçu gratuitement

Если вкратце, то игра стала однообразной и пресной.Есть хорошие идеи: различные перки,скилы, внезапные вторжения неубиваемых врагов, заставляющих понервничать и обдумывать как завершить уровень побыстрей, новые противники(с единственной активной зоной для нанесения дамага и шипастые чуваки,которые взрываются при попаданиях)+ добавили метательные подручные средства(колья,гвозди,посуда,ножи и т.п.)и новое оружие- трёхзарядная стреляющая кольями пушка,снаряды из которой можно перехватить в воздухе и отправить в голову стрелявшего.Но малое количество карт и наглое растягивание игры портит всё
А теперь по порядку:
Перки и скилы:
Перки даются после прохождения двух локаций ,два на выбор, и делятся на три типа: баф(бьём посильней, стреляем побыстрей, перезарядка способности быстрее, патронов побольше,банальный отхил и т.д.),геймплей(элементы декора при разбивании раскидывают осколки,пули проходят через врагов насквозь, если убиваешь противника перезарядка мгновенная и т.д.) и бесполезный хлам(смертельный прыжок на врага и рикошет). Почему же рикошет и смертельный прыжок бесполезны? Да потому что все локации открытые и возможности пострелять из-за угла в них нет, а локаций на которых возможно прыгнуть на врага всего две, на тренировке этого перка становится понятно что главгерой ни разу не супермарио и вы там умрёте раз 6,потому что при подпрыгивании,если учитывать высоту камеры, ты не запрыгиваешь на врага а просто подлетаешь на уровне условного пупка. Скилы уже поинтересней: они даются один на выбор перед миссией и радикально влияют на стиль игры.Проблема в том что первый же скил,имбовее чем остальные, за счёт того, что у него самый короткий откат,он выполняет ту же функцию что и скил из первой части(перемещение вселением в противника),но при этом предмет который вы держали до перемещения не выбрасывается из рук,противник точно так же не выживает после этого, но и его оружие остаётся целым. Скил для милишника,позволяющий швырять катану и притягивать её обратно бесполезен, т.к. у него долгий откат, а холодного оружия на локации полно.
Противники:
В этом плане есть много схожего с насильниками и собаками из хотлайн маями 2: особые враги будут вас бесить своими кривыми прожектайлами постоянно - что шипованные козлы, шипы у которых иногда перестают быть видимыми, что мины,которые наоборот могут всей охапкой влететь в вашего персонажа но ничего не произойдёт,что мудаки только с одной активной для нанесения дамага зоной, целясьь в которую в упор холодным оружием гг умудряется бить мимо. Неубиваемый вторженец вообще скачет игнорируя текстуры и портя всё удовольствие от игры.
Уровни:
Проходите набор локаций жмёте БОЛЬШЕ, проходите "этаж", состоящий из не отличающихся друг от дружки миссий, в каждой из которой одинаковые 10 локаций( на всю игру блть)+ новые перки("хаки") и скилы(зоны карантина) и записки из 6 слов максимум, жмёте БОЛЬШЕ получаете такую же фигню, но длиньше раза в полтора. Основная проблема в том,что враги на локациях валят бесконечно, счётчика с конкретным количеством противников которых надо убить нет,а локации однообразная мешанина из чёрного,белого и красного.Да, первый супер горячий был такой же, но там от уровня к уровню менялся дизайн и ситуации и ты перепроходишь именно локацию а не последние 10 уровней,которые к тому же перетасованы. Представьте,что вы умираете в первом хотлайне на моменте где бабу с катаной и пантер надо кубком отоваривать и вас откидывают аж на драку с байкером в телефонной компании, при этом вы выбрали интереса ради маску с дерьмовым эффектом типо перевода катсцен на французский или чёрно-оранжевый фильтр по незнанию, а поменять её вам на весь этот отрезок не дают и перекидывают после каждого фейла на неё.У меня бы так не горело с бессмертной шавки,ускоряющей процесс разноса противников в осколки и опасных объектов на карте, если бы не длина каждой миссии и обязательный просмотр перехода на другую карту,пускай и красиво оформленный.
Музыка:
Отличная, но мало: трек на локации в клубе и когда один из скилов поднимаешь звучит неплохая композиция
В плане геймплея игра хороша(потому что в плане основных механик это первая игра, спасибо что не испортили что не сломано), но репетативность и попытка игру на два часа растянуть на двадцать два, заставляя страдать от рандомной генерации и проходить одни и те же 10 карт ради нескольких строчек текста, мало дающих понять что же происходит, и к тому же ты в процессе игры ещё выгораешь от того насколько она нудная, забывая даже те огрызки текста, что игра тебе даёт. Будь это дополнением за доллар я бы поставил шестёрку:да она скучная и в жанре в котором пытается себя позиционировать(околорогалик) аутсайдер, но удовольствие от неё всё ещё можно получить, но учитывая её ценовой диапазон в шесть сотен деревянных 4/10
 
BIRDBOY

S̢͙͇̟̖͖͚̝ͭͩ̅̌ͬͤ̚U̳̱̦̯͇͋̈̍̌̀ͪ̽͡͝ͅP̸̢̨̖͚͎̰̹̩̳̪ͯ̈ͭͩͤͧͨͩ͒͛̐̕̚͘͢͝Ȩ̼̦͓̗̭̯͕̙̖͈̀́ͧͫ̋͒ͪ̽ͧͩͦ͝͡͠Ȑ̸̸̢̟͉͓̺̭̞̖̬̺͕͚̹̘̪̍̀̄̍ͤ͒͛͆ͯͯ͘͜͜͝H̴͓̤͙̖̭̯̫͔͉͙̺ͭ͒̓ͬ͑ͯ͂̓ͤ̽ͫ͛̕͢͢͞͠Ỏ̦̠͍̬̼̩͙̜̖̬̬̒̌́ͧͬ̈̓͛͟ͅͅŢ̵̬̦̥̗̠̅ͫ̊̑̈́̑̾́͌̔̀̕̚͏̣ͫ͋ͣͫ̎ ̡̨̛̗̻̯̼̱͔͕̞͙̦̦͇͗̈͋̃̄̂ͯͨ̎͐̓̅̇͜͟͜S̛̼̭̖͍̟ͦ͑̾̔̚͟U̷̵̹̤̹̿̎̏ͯ̕͟͟͡P̴̡̝̖͍̩͙̓ͩ͑ͮ̀́̀ͫ͝E̷̥̻̳͍̤̮̱̣̟̒̒͒́̅̈́̌̽͋̑ͫ͝R̨̘̖̻̭̱̥̲̰͎̼̒̿̀ͮ̈̿͗̀ͦ̀ͪ̒̈́͆̚̕͜͝͞Ḩ̨̰͓̰̻̫̘͑̿̓̍̇̄͌͒̓ͮ͘̕̚Ơ͉̺̙͙̺̓̀̃̒ͤ̂͠͏̱̭̯ͧ́͐̈͑ͣ̈́͟T̷̨̨̧̲̖̗̣̤͚̹͇͓̬͚̮̣̓̒ͣ́͐͌̓̿ͭͤ̽͐͝͡͡ ̵̷̸̛̦̗͕͍̹̳͇̜͍͎̎̊̀ͣ͒͗͐ͫ͌̄̌͂͘͘͘͠ S̢̢͙͇̟̖͖͚̝͔̙̜̯ͭͩ̅̌ͬͤͯ́̈̏̅ͩͧ̚̚U̳̱̦̯͇͋̈̍̌̀ͪ̽͡͝ͅP̸̢̨̖͚͎̰̹̩̳̪̲ͯ̈ͭͩͤͧͨͩ͒͛̐͑̕̚͘͢͝Ȩ̼̦͓̗̭̯͕̙̖͈͍̦͙̟̀́ͧͫ̋͒ͪ̽ͧͩͦ͑ͪ͐̐̒̀͑ͬ̀͆ͬͧ͊̚͝͡͠ͅȐ̸̸̵̢̟͉͓̺̭̞̖̬̺͕͚̹̘̪̼̤̯̹͎̳̙̹̞͚͈̍̀̄̍ͤ͒͛͆ͯͯͥ́ͮͤ͘͜͜͝͠H̴̸̡̡͓̤͙̖̭̯̫͔͉͙̺̜̦̞̬ͭ͒̓ͬ͑ͯ͂̓ͤ̽ͫ͛͂ͪ̏ͥ̕͘͢͢͜͞͠͞Ỏ̦̠͍̬̼̩͙̜̖̬̬̒̌́ͧͬ̈̓͛͟ͅͅŢ̵̬̦̥̗̠̅ͫ̊̑̈́̑̾́͌̔̀̕̚͏̢̛̣̥ͫ͋ͣͫ̎̏́͐ ̡̨̛̗̻̯̼̱͔͕̞͙̦̦͇͗̈͋̃̄̂ͯͨ̎͐̓̅̇͜͟͜S̛̼̭̖͍̟ͦ͑̾̔̎̚͟U̷̵̵̹̤̹̯͖̳̺̿̎̏ͯͪ̊̂ͫ̊ͦ̕̕͟͟͡͝P̴̸̡̛̝̖͍̩͙̼̣̫͔̗̖̥̓ͩ͑ͮ̀́̀ͫ̌ͫ͛̆̾̄ͥ͊̕͝Ȩ̷̸̛̥̻̳͍̤̮̱̣̟̝̫͈͇̪̒̒͒́̅̈́̌̽͋̑ͫ̂̈́̃͝͠R̨̘̖̻̭̱̥̲̰͎̼͓̩̣̪̜͙̙̒̿̀ͮ̈̿͗̀ͦ̀ͪ̒̈́͆̌̓ͫ͋ͮͦ͌̏͑̚̕͘͘͜͝͞͝Ḩ̨̰͓̰̻̫̘͇̪̼̦͑̿̓̍̇̄͌͒̓ͮ͛̔̓̓̍͂̏͘̕̚͞͞ͅƠ͉̺̙͙̺̓̀̃̒ͤ̂͠͏̴̱̭̯͔̣ͧ́͐̈͑ͣ̈́̾̉͂̀̔ͭ͘͟͝T̷̷̨̨̧̡̧̛̲̖̗̣̤͚̹͇͓̬͚̮̣̜͕̺̯̓̒ͣ́͐͌̓̿ͭͤ̽͐̈́͋ͪͩ̀̉̇͝͡͡ ̵̷̸̛̦̗͕͍̹̳͇̜͍͎̩͓̲̭̎̊̀ͣ͒͗͐ͫ͌̄̌͂̃ͮ͘͘͘̚͠͡ S̶̢̢̡͙͇̟̖͖͚̝͔̙̜̯͖̖̠̖̘ͭͩ̅̌ͬͤͯ́̈̏̅ͩͧ̌͊͗ͩͩ͐̃̚̚͜͡U̴̢̳̱̦̯͇̰̤͖̤̫̯̜̫̙̞͋̈̍̌̀ͪ̽̉́ͭ̐ͮ̽͋̓͡͝ͅP̸̸̵̢̨̖͚͎̰̹̩̳̪̲̤̟̻̘̪͍̣̞ͯ̈ͭͩͤͧͨͩ͒͛̐͑̀͆ͪͤͯ̂͛̽̕̚͘̕͢͝͞Ȩ̢̼̦͓̗̭̯͕̙̖͈͍̦͙̟̠̖͖̦̀́ͧͫ̋͒ͪ̽ͧͩͦ͑ͪ͐̐̒̀͑ͬ̀͆ͬͧ͊̀̑̏͗̾̚͘͝͡͠͞ͅȐ̸̸̵̢̟͉͓̺̭̞̖̬̺͕͚̹̘̪̼̤̯̹͎̳̙̹̞͚͈͖͎̍̀̄̍ͤ͒͛͆ͯͯͥ́ͮͤ́ͭ̓̃ͧ͘͜͜͝͠͝͠H̴̸̡̡͓̤͙̖̭̯̫͔͉͙̺̜̦̞̬ͭ͒̓ͬ͑ͯ͂̓ͤ̽ͫ͛͂ͪ̏ͥ̕͘͢͢͜͞͠͞Ỏ̶̶̦̠͍̬̼̩͙̜̖̬̬̫̞̤̤̪̒̌́ͧͬ̈̓͛̓̊̽͑̀͟͢ͅͅŢ̵̬̦̥̗̠̅ͫ̊̑̈́̑̾́͌̔̀̕̚͏̢̛̣̥ͫ͋ͣͫ̎̏́͐ ̶̡̨̛̛̗̻̯̼̱͔͕̞͙̦̦͇̘͚͗̈͋̃̄̂ͯͨ̎͐̓̅̇̆ͥ̆͜͟͜S̛̼̭̖͍̟͙ͦ͑̾̔̎̽̚̕͟U̷̵̵̴̹̤̹̯͖̳̺̼͉̮̝̿̎̏ͯͪ̊̂ͫ̊ͦͣ́̎̕̕͟͟͡͝P̴̸̷̡̡̢̛̝̖͍̩͙̼̣̫͔̗̖̥͔̰̮̲̮̓ͩ͑ͮ̀́̀ͫ̌ͫ͛̆̾̄ͥ͊͋̆̋̏̇͆̓ͫ̕͝͞Ȩ̷̸̛̥̻̳͍̤̮̱̣̟̝̫͈͇̪͕͔̣̜̒̒͒́̅̈́̌̽͋̑ͫ̂̈́̃ͪ͐ͦ̋͗͌͝͠ͅR̨̘̖̻̭̱̥̲̰͎̼͓̩̣̪̜͙̙̥͉̰̟̒̿̀ͮ̈̿͗̀ͦ̀ͪ̒̈́͆̌̓ͫ͋ͮͦ͌̏͑ͫ͗̽̌̊̓̒̚̕͘͘͜͝͞͝Ḩ̨̰͓̰̻̫̘͇̪̼̦͈͑̿̓̍̇̄͌͒̓ͮ͛̔̓̓̍͂̏̀̌͗̀̄͘̕̚͞͞ͅ͏̫̫͋ͣͥƠ͉̺̙͙̺̓̀̃̒ͤ̂͠͏̴̵̱̭̯͔̣̻̪̫̦̹ͧ́͐̈͑ͣ̈́̾̉͂̀̔ͭ́̇̿̾̊ͯ̏̓͘͟͝ͅT̷̷̨̨̧̡̧̛̲̖̗̣̤͚̹͇͓̬͚̮̣̜͕̺̯̮̣͈̬̦̓̒ͣ́͐͌̓̿ͭͤ̽͐̈́͋ͪͩ̀̉̇͆̽ͫ͊͑ͫ͝͡͡ ̵̷̸̢̛̦̗͕͍̹̳͇̜͍͎̩͓̲̭͕͔͙͔̘̎̊̀ͣ͒͗͐ͫ͌̄̌͂̃ͮ̏ͬ̏ͥ̔͘͘͘̚͠͡ S̶̢̢̡͙͇̟̖͖͚̝͔̙̜̯͖̖̠̖̘̟ͭͩ̅̌ͬͤͯ́̈̏̅ͩͧ̌͊͗ͩͩ͐̃̈́̈́̚̚͜͡U̴̵̶̢̳̱̦̯͇̰̤͖̤̫̯̜̫̙̞̦͙͇̝͓̝̻̮̹̯͕͋̈̍̌̀ͪ̽̉́ͭ̐ͮ̽͋̓ͭ̔ͣͬ͘͜͢͡͝ͅP̸̸̵̢̨̖͚͎̰̹̩̳̪̲̤̟̻̘̪͍̣̞ͯ̈ͭͩͤͧͨͩ͒͛̐͑̀͆ͪͤͯ̂͛̽̌̌̕̚͘̕̕͘͘͢͝͞Ȩ̴̢̼̦͓̗̭̯͕̙̖͈͍̦͙̟̠̖͖̦̲̪͙̯̦̥͍̺̼͇̀́ͧͫ̋͒ͪ̽ͧͩͦ͑ͪ͐̐̒̀͑ͬ̀͆ͬͧ͊̀̑̏͗̾̌͛͋́ͪ̀̅̚͘̚͢͝͡͠͞ͅȐ̸̸̵̴̢̟͉͓̺̭̞̖̬̺͕͚̹̘̪̼̤̯̹͎̳̙̹̞͚͈͖͎͖̍̀̄̍ͤ͒͛͆ͯͯͥ́ͮͤ́ͭ̓̃ͧ͘͜͜͝͠͝͠H̴̸̡̡̢͓̤͙̖̭̯̫͔͉͙̺̜̦̞̬̺ͭ͒̓ͬ͑ͯ͂̓ͤ̽ͫ͛͂ͪ̏ͥ̇ͩ̕͘͢͢͜͞͠͞͏̛ͬͤ͑ͧ͒͛̃Ỏ̶̶̦̠͍̬̼̩͙̜̖̬̬̫̞̤̤̪̒̌́ͧͬ̈̓͛̓̊̽͑̀͟͢ͅͅŢ̵̬̦̥̗̠̅ͫ̊̑̈́̑̾́͌̔̀̕̚͏̢̛̣̥ͫ͋ͣͫ̎̏́͐ 󰀜 Nytrowgen

Recommandé
10.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 1 aout 2020
Produit reçu gratuitement

Naprawdę chciałbym powiedzieć, że ta gra jest lepsza od oryginalnego SUPERHOTa, ale nie mogę.
Poważnie, SUPERHOT: MIND CONTROL DELETE miał wielki potencjał, by być tym samym, co oryginał, tylko lepszym. Niestety, nie pozwala mu na to kilka poważnych wad.

PLUSY:
+ To dalej SUPERHOT, najbardziej innowacyjny shooter w jaki grałem od lat,
+ Grafika jest zauważalnie lepsza, niż w poprzedniczce,
+ Świetny soundtrack,
+ Nowe bronie - parę rzucanych (noże, widelce, piły tarczowe, ołówki, shurikeny - naprawdę przyjemnie się ich używa) oraz railgun,
+ Nowe rodzaje wrogów,
+ Parę nowych map,
+ Ulepszenia postaci i zdolności specjalne - są one po prostu fantastyczne.

MINUSY:
- Słaba fabuła. Tak w pierwszym SUPERHOcie przynajmniej mniej więcej było wiadomo, o co w niej chodzi, tak tu jest ona taka... żadna, niepotrzebnie rozciągnięta i nie prowadzi do nikąd,
- Nie wiem, czy kiedykolwiek widziałem bardziej idiotyczne zakończenie gry. Dlaczego? Dochodzimy do finału, produkcja nie odpowiada na żadne z pytań, zadaje tylko następne, po czym musimy czekać 2,5h (przed patchem - osiem. OSIEM GODZIN), by móc zagrać w nią ponownie. Tak, gra musi być włączona przez cały ten czas,
- Jest określona liczba map, po odkryciu wszystkich przechodzimy je w kółko, co po jakimś czasie robi się nudne,
- Późniejsze poziomy bywają frustrująco trudne,
- Po zdobyciu zdolności specjalnej HOTSWITCH, zdolność CHARGE staje się w zasadzie bezużyteczna,
- Parę dokuczliwych bugów, niektóre z nich prowadzą do natychmiastowej śmierci.

OCENA: 7/10,
a szkoda, bo mogłaby być wyższa.

Jeśli jesteś fanem/fanką poprzedniej gry z tej serii, to mimo wszystko warto w to zagrać. Jeśli nie, to zagraj w oryginalnego SUPERHOTa.
 
GoatChan
439 produits enregistrés
0

ОЛЕГ МАЙАМИ
64 produits enregistrés
0
17 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
1
Non recommandé
9.0 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 17 juillet 2020
Produit reçu gratuitement

The game starts of really strong. I enjoyed the first couple hours thoroughly, however I can't recommend this game because of the next hours.

This review has a fair few spoilers, so I'll spoiler tag the entire thing.


Each "Node" or Stage essentially gets progressively longer. You need to kill more enemies, survive longer, and there are more 'missions' inside the stage. This ramps up the difficulty artificially, and makes short but thrilling runs very rare. Instead, it's a grind and a slog to complete the stages,

Later into the game, there are some bosses that randomly join your fights in each mission. Not only do they have a jumpscare spawn, but they're a nightmare to deal with on top of all the enemies.

If you want to finish stages fast, you have to go with a core that allows you to play to kill. For example, katana core, mind core, or charge core. These are all things that make your play style more aggressive allowing you to not take forever on each node, at the downside of having only 2 hearts. (1 hit = 1 heart lost.) Because of this, the more aggressively you play, the more likely you are to have a random enemy beside you ready to instakill you, or some other random method of death.

For instance, in the very last mission of a node, I threw my katana at a fully red person wielding an assault rifle. I was absolutely sure this was going to hit, so I got confident enough to move around faster. Apparently, that was a big mistake. Another red person was "in front" of the gun wielding one, and as such he blocked the throw. (Keep in mind, I threw to the left of him, plenty of room to not hit him.)

I'd been using most upgrades on healing due to random bs hits, and even that was not enough to just survive the very last mission. Quite often, it felt like my shots that hit them very clearly, had 0 effect on the enemy, including thrown weapons.
I'm still most likely going to finish the game to completion because it was free, and to see if it gets any better, but for now my review is staying negative.
 
Nobody | Killer
397 produits enregistrés
1
17 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Non recommandé
4.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 20 juillet 2020
Produit reçu gratuitement

I am SHOCKED.

I can not understand how the geniuses behind the original game's system came up with this betrayal.

The whole point of the first game was the excellent level design. You had very limited options in order to survive because you die in one hit and yet you had so much freedom in how you kill your enemies in these very precisely arranged levels. The levels in the actual game were so smooth because every level would explore the game's engine more and more leaving you with such genius stages like the Katana assasination drop down playground one or the train or even the truck one was just so elegently simple and yet so clever. It was a lot of action but also some sort of puzzle game at the same time.

With this one, you get the same stuff as before but in a, as I call it, ♥♥♥♥-version. In this game, you don't die in one hit and receive hearts for a number of levels that allow you to get hit over the course of a couple levels. Then you get random ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ upgrades, like get more hearts, hold a random weapon every level's beginning, move faster, etc. and the levels are not designed to be solved, they are just a bunch of uninspired and cheap areas to very easily be cleared in the first try.

So the developers wanted to create "runs" with lives in which you have to start from the beginning if you die in one of the levels and you get upgrades and stuff, almost feels like a roguelite in a way. What does it do? It completely shatters the greatness of Superhot. It's just random. It does not matter how you play, you can just be brainless and walk through the levels, doesn't matter if you get hit, either, you will survive. And then you can get the healing upgrade and then you go on with these levels in which you don't even have to kill every red guy, like what was the idea behind that?! Feels super unsatisfying and I wish they didn't release this cash grab. Superhot was perfect, they should have just put it down and create something else instead of messing up their idea. They added some soundtracks sometimes which barely had a meaningful effect and also just messed up their original aesthetic.

So, in conclusion, this game is like Superhot without the stuff that really make Superhot such a great game. It's a huge, huge disappointment to me. GO PLAY the original Superhot, it's perfect, but don't you ever play this one.
 
Hinnerk
184 produits enregistrés
0
6 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
9.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 5 septembre 2020
Vários modos de jogo e não-repetibilidade tornam esse jogo um must.
 
ANGELICA ZAPATA
2,222 produits enregistrés
0
9 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Recommandé
14.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 1 septembre 2019
Avis donné pendant l'accès anticipé

Superhot was an incredible experience. Between the campaign and the post-game challenges, it was a genuinely spooky and innovative experience.

This is wider, but shallower. There are a lot of really interesting traits and trait combinations you can pick up that make for genuinely fun moments, such as moving faster, swinging faster, and have a recallable katana all at once. But no matter what combination of traits are making your run interesting (or unfortunately sometimes not), you're going to be using them on the same handful of levels, over and over.

If you enjoyed Superhot and felt you'd like a bit more of it, this is fine for while. I'd definitely recommend picking it up. But don't come in thinking you've found Superhot 2.
 
Neems
1,493 produits enregistrés
0
13 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation amusante
2
Non recommandé
5.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 28 mai 2021
The game has artistic themes of repetitiveness, addiction and spiraling down. But I don't think that going throught same 7-8 levels with random spawn points and weapons is a best way to show it. My first super hot expirience was VR one and I love it because you never know which puzzle next level will provide and how it would look like. Original game was fine too in that regard.
I'm just dropping MCD, because it's feels like a chore and because I heard about 2 hour ending already. You can defenetly say that first two games are very addictive, but this one just feels lazy. IDK maybe developers assemble together few levels, made this controversial ending for free marketing and sell their lazy work. If this is a real case (which we're never know) that means this game is just pretentious.

84 produits enregistrés
0
14 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Non recommandé
13.0 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 10 mars 2023
This game started out being a lot of fun. The first few levels get you immersed into the game play and excited to control time to defeat the "red guys" as the game calls them. However, what follows is nothing but repetitive level grinding that has no depth. There is no story, there is no plot, there is no development from one level to the next. It is the same thing, every level, and it only gets more frustrating the more you play.

The "plot" that is loosely inputted into the game is literally a walking simulator that somehow also manages to be frustrating. The developer decided to slow down your movement speed to a crawl, or teleport you back 5-10 feet every time you went 2 feet forward, all this to get to a destination that served no purpose. The text that is displayed over these scenes serve no purpose. There is nothing interesting about it, and it does not develop any type of story.

The end of the game is even worse, as you are placed into a 2D walking simulator through what I can only define as "a void of error code visualized", all to come upon a screen that tells you to wait 2.5 hours to actually complete the game. From researching, I discovered this timer used to be 8 hours that you had to wait through. Literally, you have to keep the game open until the timer runs out in order for the credits to roll.

This game had a lot of potential. There could have at least been a story implemented that served to keep the repetitive game play interesting. But there is not. There is nothing but meaningless grinding. If you want to experience shooting guys with the ability to control time, play the first game. It is far better and far shorter than this game.
 
The real banana

7 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile

Non recommandé
5.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 20 juillet 2020
Produit reçu gratuitement

打到长期6（墙面地面大量的尖刺地雷、第一次遇到狗头人）死活打不过去。
这作的rogue元素太浓了，随机的地图以及起始位置、随机的敌人以及地雷位置，还有一死亡就重新刷新整关的地图从头打。
这就导致了游戏过程远没有一代流畅和舒服。再加上地图设计并不是很合理，这就导致某关要么出生在资源多且适合防守的位置，多半在某个不开放的楼梯间或是有掩体的墙根处，敌人无脑冲过来排队送；要么就腹背受敌，用冲刺或热切换刚逃离包围圈就被新刷出的敌人或是地雷害死。
虽然是免费送的吧，但我会上手玩就是想体验前作那样，子弹时间下分步骤解决敌军重重围困所带来的流畅感。而不是地牢刷刷刷。
不是说这代的关卡设计就不好。的确，新加入的地图和能力以及一步步解锁的关卡会让我刚开始玩的时候眼前一亮。
但是玩下来就越发感到过多的随机要素可能并不太适合这种游戏类型。至少不适合拿来做主线。
 
VenomNuCola

Évaluation publiée le 25 juillet 2020
If you like the mechanics of the original SUPERHOT game, feel free to buy this part. Added 32 permanent locations, more throwing and firearms, more red men, more shooting, new skills. new enemies that can repel your bullets, such as: spiky punk, dog-man, red dude in armor, who only needs to shoot at a certain part of the body. Especially, I liked the "Disco level"
I have not noticed a new story, just new repetitive levels, but still recommend this game.

Vidéo YouTube™: SUPERHOT: MIND CONTROL DELETE - SuperShoot [2020 PC GAME 1080p60fps] 
Vues : 67
You stand in the center of a firefight. A hail of slow motion bullets is inching slowly towards your face. You see bright red enemies frozen in place as they run towards you.
 
Fantastic
4,252 produits enregistrés
0
6 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
46.3 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 31 décembre 2019
The best FPS i've played in... wait a minute

So, ever since I wrote the review for this little piece, it got launched, updated and overall better.

If you played the original, you already know the drill. Get gun, kill red dude, die, repeat. And of course, time only moves, when you move.

MCD expands on that. It adds a completely new aspect to the game. It tells another story, this time about multiple people, about the system expanding, changing, becoming something new, which in my opinion is better than the original. Or idk, maybe I was too dumb to understand the original, so yeah.

But the new thing about this game is that it completely changes how SUPERHOT works, at its core, quite literally. Now, instead of fighting hordes of bad guys again and again, you will fight them in a rogue-like style. Basically, every node/level is now a run, and has a number of scenarios you have to go through. Between these little victories, you get the chance to upgrade yourself, with HACKs. These hacks are basically little abilites that you get to use until the run ends and you finish every node. You can start with a katana, or a random gun, you can punch stronger or run faster. Of course, these are the starting ones, you unlock new stuf along the way and they're overall really fun.

There's also a new mechanic, similar to HACKs, called COREs. These are just like the hacks, abilities you get to use along the run. However, these are permanent and you can choose one at the start of each run to better fit your playstyle. And yes, katana mode lovers, there is a core just for you. Imagine the COREs as classes you get to choose at the start of a run in a Rogue-like and the HACKs the upgrades or new weapons you get.

Speaking of new weapons, our arsenal is pretty expanded now. We have a whole new menu of choices for throwables, melees, there's even a pencil. You know, in case someone kills your dog or steals your car.

There are endless possibilities for fun and enjoyment, and I really love this game. My only complain is the ridiculous ending. Having to wait 8 HOURS WITH THE GAME OPEN to play the game again after everything is deleted is just ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥. I know they're trying to be meta and all, but this is just insane. Undertale did the same thing and it didn't even take 5 minutes to revert it all back. Please change that.

Overall, buy this, kill some dudes and have fun because this is really a great game
 
ryderhimself
241 produits enregistrés
0
10 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Recommandé
37.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 16 octobre 2022
《ULTRA HOT》
在前作（空一格）
《超性感》
（万万岁）的基础上改善了用户体验，比如被背刺时偶尔可以捡回一命和闪躲子弹更加容易等等，同时新增大量巨他妈有趣的新元素，让本作成为了动作英雄幻想的终极满足

比较奇怪的就是本作的流程改成了完全只有在一个个竞技场式小地图迎击一波一波敌人的模式，虽然地图设计和其它元素的搭配让它的可玩性仍然优秀，但缺失了前作关卡里的设计感和剧情元素，过于模式化了，虽然无止境的屠杀很上头也符合本作的“欲望”词条就是
 
UwU
266 produits enregistrés
0
4 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Non recommandé
6.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 7 novembre 2022
Manteniendo el concepto de su antecesor, SUPERHOT: MIND CONTROL DELETE (SMCD) intenta llevarlo más allá prolongando su duración. Sin embargo, inevitablemente transforma una experiencia de juego placentera, en un calvario interminable.

La idea de que el tiempo avanza cuando nosotros nos movemos, es un concepto que SUPERHOT original supo darnos, pero que ya habiendo sido explotada poco más podía hacerse; y es cuando SMCD entra en acción usando las mismas mecánicas pero adicionando algunas mejoras como la posibilidad de tener más vidas o bonuses de diferentes tipos. A priori es una mejora notable, sin embargo, se prolongaron excesivamente los escenarios y no es que su estética minimalista ayude mucho a contrarrestar esto, volviendo de esta experiencia de juego algo más aburrido que ir a misa. Sumado a esto, la aparición de enemigos invencibles pueden hacerte repetir varios set de niveles (si, set de niveles, porque al morir, tenes que arrancar el set formado entre 5 a 10 niveles de nuevo). A nivel sonoro no tengo quejas, pero no hubo mejoras respecto a la primera versión.

SMCD está sostenido en un argumento pobre que busca mantener al jugador cautivado ♥♥♥ información superficial e irrelevante. Y eso sin detenernos a mencionar que para terminar el juego, se debe de dejar la PC encendida 2:30hs haciendo nada. Pero claro, el argumento así lo demanda. Para fortuna y desgracia, el gameplay entero supera las 6 hs y es fácil de encontrar ♥♥♥ al menos 60% off. En lo personal, la primera entrega es más barata y mejor.
 
Cerezo
1,682 produits enregistrés
4
8 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
10.0 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 16 aout 2020
Produit reçu gratuitement

전작 엔딩에서 이미 ONE OF US 가 되어버린 플레이어.
더 많이.

대충 엔딩크레딧을 보고 평가를 작성해봅니다.
전작의 핫스위치 기능에 해당하는 .core 기능은 꽤나 반가웠고 이번작의 신기술 .hack 기능이 참 재미있었네요.
물론 코어는 여러개 있다고 해도 핫스위치가 제일 좋았고 그거만 사용했습니다.

그보다 이번작은 게임성을 올리면서 난이도도 같이 확 올린것 같습니다.
중후반부에 나오는 얼굴마담인 가시달린적부터 시작해서
일부만 빨간색인 적, 가시함정, .core 기능을 사용하는 무적인 적까지..
특히 등뒤에서 갑툭튀하는 카타나 든 적에 많이 놀랐습니다. 한번은 봐주는거 고맙더라.
전작은 스토리 중심의 게임. 이번작은 메커니즘 중심의 게임. 정도로 요약할수 있겠네요.

전작 구매자에게 신작을 무료로 주는 제작사의 패기에도 지렸습니다. 무료로 안줘도 샀겠지만..

구글링을 해보니 여러가지 정보가 잘 나옵니다. 코어가 하나 더 있다는데 왜 본적이 없지.
전작처럼 시크릿 메시지도 맵마다 있는 모양.
100% 클리어를 목표로 해야겠습니다.

엔딩 관련 내용
데이터 복구 2시간30분 기다리기 귀찮으시다면
AppData\LocalLow\SUPERHOT_Team\SHMCD 폴더의 shmcd.save 파일을 노트패드로 오픈하면
앞쪽의 INHTINHT로 몇십줄 써있는곳 바로 아랫줄에 ZB로 시작하는 문자열이 있습니다.
그 문자열중 첫번째로 나오는 알파벳 V를 H로 바꾼후 저장. 다시 실행하면 시간이 지나있습니다.
혹시 모르니 .save파일을 백업해두시길 바랍니다.
이게 전에는 8시간이었다는거 같은데 2시간 30분도 좀 그렇지.. 의도를 잘 모르겠습니다..
 
MonkeyP

比一代玩法得到了很大的提升
多了新武器，新敌人
游戏中你不再是一个只能背板才能通关的机器了
几张地图，敌人随机生成，能不能通关完全靠玩家的策略和反应能力
游戏有轻度rogue like元素，可以给人物增添外挂（技能），可以一直升级近战，走武士刀流，也可以升级远程，走枪手流
缺点就是地图比较少，而且地图很不平衡，遇到开阔场景直接gg，遇到封闭场景就苟着当老六就能通关

Évaluation publiée le 28 mai 2019
Avis donné pendant l'accès anticipé

DAS ist mal ein Spiel nach meinem Geschmack, wie man so schön sagt. Habe mich schon lange auf "Superhot" gefreut und jetzt spiele ich erst einmal "Superhot: Mind Control Delete". Es sind Episoden im Stil von einem Hacker gemacht - Geiles Gameplay - man hat 3 Leben und die sind manchmal schneller weg, als gedacht.
Steuerung etc. ist wie gewohnt mit "W,A,s,D", Leertaste und die Mousetasten... alles ganz easy. Bin bei diesem Game noch am Anfang, aber die haben es zu Weilen ganz schön in sich!
Alles in Allem ein guter Kauf! Empfehlung? Für mich und bestimmt auch Anderen auf jeden Fall!!!

Gug!

9 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile

Recommandé
33.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 11 janvier 2018
Avis donné pendant l'accès anticipé

UPD! UPD! UPD!
In the end

Yea, it's infinitive gamemode now.
Isaac in the world of SUPERHOT (at this moment it doesnt have campaign, so concept is to make Isaac, to play a lot of time in this game). I like this idea, but few levels... that sucks. Hopefully its Early Ac., I believe they will make more content.

+PROS+

+ Same game, old memories. Yes, its still good
+ New objectives to throw and act
+ New maps, levels. That's great because they have country themes (Egypt and etc.)
+ Maps have a lot of ways to climb
+ You can still make "Deadly Jump" (Jump into Red Dudes and destroy them w/ ur body)
+ Early Access and game already playable, it's done, lol. That means only thing it needs - content. Thats a HUGE + to belive that game will be finished, that game will be finished great!

-♥♥♥♥-
Yeah-yeah, there are ♥♥♥♥ of SUPERHOT (orly? ye, it has few ♥♥♥♥)

- Concept to make replayable game cool... and its sucks at the same time. No story, no thoughts, just rogue-like beating
- A little bit boring after playing replayable game. What does have Isaac? Items, trinks, cards, enems, bosses, lvls, rooms, secrets. SUPERHOT? Maps, mechanics, weapons and secrets (at least first game). So... We need more and more stuff to play this game for hundred hours, like other rogue repl. games.
- AS ALWAYS tiny settings, few things. Not important BUUUUT... what about colorblind people? What about new features? It will be good, but its only my opinion, I dont believe developers will read my comm. Heh.

Well, time to said last words, end of review.
As always, first games better than sequels, prequels and another and... "Same rules apply". If you're fan - BUY. It's not a big price for Early game and ofc. to support devs. If you dont feel that SUPERHOT IS AMAZING LOL OMG STOP ME I WANT TO JOIN SYSTEM OMG OMG OMG HOTSWITCH TO THE CORE dont buy it. I have it and I'm happy.

P.S. Ty devs for all, make new things, features, modes, addons, lvls, weaps, enemies, and other stuff. We need this <3

9.5/10

********UPDATE********
HOLLY MOLLY! Next day, small patch (53 mb) and... KHM. Now YOU can CHANGE THE RULES KEYMAP yay. Finally. But I've found bug, when you just open "Controls" and didnt change anything, you cant "Go up". But its not important. They also added more Graphic settings. Guys, you're amazing, I appreciate that, waiting for more and more :)
 
͋ȼǥ_ɍȺɨłŧɍȺɨłŧɨmɇ
0
11 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Non recommandé
51.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 26 aout 2020
Produit reçu gratuitement

This game is pretty fun, but all in all I wouldn't recommend it and I'll get into why. First the good parts:
+The concept is pretty cool
+all the cores and cheats that weren't part of the first game really add a lot of variety to playing each node
+The meta story is pretty interesting at times
+Props to the developers for giving the game away for free to anyone who owned the first SUPERHOT

However the negatives just got to me and it reached a point where I simply couldn't ignore them anymore and ultimately had to give this a negative review:
- The hitboxes on the player seem really unpredictable and there are times when you are killed seemingly by nothing, and after a while it gets really infuriating, especially on the tougher nodes or if playing with the Pure core
- The jump in difficulty is ridiculous and eventually the gameplay is just too chaotic for my liking with all the unkillable enemies and spacial distortion
- The absolute ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ of completing the game is unspeakably annoying. I get that the point of the game is to show that we're addicted or something, but it is overdone to death. When I see an 8 hour (2.5 now but still ridiculous) waiting time just to play the game again, I don't think "GUHHHHH MUST GET MORE GAME MUST WAIT", I just think "okay I'll go play something else then", which I did. When I found out about that stupid feature I didn't play the game for a week because I just didn't care to go through it. I honestly felt no reward for waiting the 2.5 hours because all you seem to get is a core that puts you at a disadvantage and a few extra nodes. The whole addiction theme is really overdone with stuff like this and it honestly just got on my nerves; criticising game addiction by deliberately putting in ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ content like this that makes us wait hours just to play, the same as Netflix criticising paedophilia by making a movie about sexualising kids
- The harder nodes honestly just don't even feel that rewarding to do. There is a node that makes you play dozens of maps non-stop, and I actually poured several hours of my life into it thinking it would feel good to finally conquer, but it honestly just felt like I wasted my time, but I suppose that was probably the intention of the developers. There is simply too much luck to the game with the random exploding enemies and the random spawns that land you next to 3 enemies all with assault rifles, and the constantly dice roll of how your fights will start just remove the merit of completing the challenging parts of the game.

All in all, the game is pretty fun, but it really just has a few major issues that really build up overtime and just make the game no longer enjoyable after a certain point. If you're going to make a game obtusely difficult, at least have the decency to make it feel rewarding when you finally do it. A 100 level node is not a fun challenge, it's just spam and ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥
 
Shaqspeare
249 produits enregistrés

1,132 produits enregistrés
